name: Anjali
greetingText: I never mentioned it often but I really like your name!
wishText: I hope you always stay smiley and cute (and smarty-pants too);)
textInChatBox: Happiest birthday cutieee!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: Tbh that's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something...
outroText: Okay, Whatsapp me back to tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
